revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_LeafThrust}} '''A_LeafThrust'''
(no parameters)
Has a 37.5% chance of increasing the actor's Z momentum by a random amount between 1 and 3 every time it is called.
This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Leaf1}} and derived classes.
==Examples== See {{Class|Leaf1}} and {{Class|Leaf2}} for examples.
[[Category:Decorate Missile movement functions]] [[category:Decorate Hexen functions]] [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:LeafThrust}}
